awd_titl_txt: Computer and Information Science and Engineering (CISE)     Research Instrumentation
awd_abstract_narration: A memory upgrade for NCUBE parallel processor will be provided for              researchers at Tufts University  for research in the Department of              Computer Science.                                                                                                                                               The equipment is provided under the Instrumentation Grants for Research         in Computer and Information Science and Engineering program.                                                                                                    The equipment will be used for several research projects, including in          particular:                                                                                                                                                     1. Parallel Algorithms for Knowledge Representation                             2. Machine Learning: Mapping and Integrating Analogical Models                  3. Support Environment for Parallel Programs                                    4. VLSI Layout Algorithms                                                       5. An Expert System that Identifies Damage in Structures
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
